name: chesslike-board
description: Presentation layer for puzzles on a rectangular board.
author: pbuk (https://github.com/pbuk-uk)

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && vite build && npm run build:types
scripts.build:rename: npm run build:rename:iife && npm run build:rename:esm
scripts.build:rename:iife: shx mv dist/*.iife.js dist/chesslike-board.min.js && shx mv dist/*.iife.js.map dist/chesslike-board.min.js.map
scripts.build:rename:esm: shx mv dist/*board.js dist/chesslike-board.mjs && shx mv dist/*board.js.map dist/chesslike-board.mjs.map
